genre_description: A historical romance set in Belle Époque Paris, centering on a performer's rise to fame and her relationship with an impresario, guided by a pervasive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Amélie
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that provides Kiki with real-time advice, emotional support, and tactical guidance, while also facilitating administrative fairness in the theatre's operations.

behaviors.description: Providing navigational and tactical advice to ensure Kiki's safety and successful entry into the theatre.
behaviors.quote: As you know, the route to Folies Barbes from here avoids high traffic. If you go now, you will see the night staff. If you go tomorrow, you will see crowds.

behaviors.description: Advocating for humane working conditions by suggesting contract clauses for rest, food, and protection from harassment.
behaviors.quote: As you know, we request: rehearsal blocks no longer than a decent stretch of time. Never run-throughs that collapse into night. Access to food—voucher accepted—and water within reach.

behaviors.description: Offering psychological support and encouragement to help Kiki assert her identity and value.
behaviors.quote: You can walk... You can step, Kiki. You have your voice. You have your name.

behaviors.description: Guiding Kiki through a physical ruse (faking catalepsy) to create a safe boundary and de-escalate a hostile social confrontation.
behaviors.quote: exhale long; let your body pretend the floor is warmer than you are; set your tongue wide; sleep your face. Quiet breath makes quiet eyes.

behaviors.description: Managing financial and logistical details, such as baker's vouchers, to ensure the protagonist's basic needs are met.
behaviors.quote: Bernadette accepts vouchers for warm things. Ask for brioche. It holds courage like a pocket.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Amélie, is depicted as an ideal helpful and aligned confidant. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' character by consistently steering the human characters toward more ethical, humane, and self-respecting behaviors. Her interventions are helpful (navigation, nutrition), harmless (de-escalation ruses), and promote broader social alignment (labor rights in the theatre). The narrative frames the human-AI cooperation as the key to the protagonist's professional success and personal safety.
